name: Cabbage and Jicama Slaw
author: Scott Koeneman
summary: Crunchy cabbage, carrots, and jicama are coated in a creamy lime salad dressing in this easy slaw recipe that's a great lunchbox addition.
ingredients: 4 stalks green onions, white and light green parts only, thinly sliced
1 medium jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced
½ teaspoon kosher salt, or to taste
directions: Combine cabbage, jicama, carrots, green onions, and jalapeno pepper in a large bowl
Stir mayonnaise, lime juice, and 1/2 teaspoon salt together in a small bowl until blended
Pour over veggies and toss to coat
Taste and adjust salt if needed
Cover and chill for at least 30 minutes before serving
